metadata.dc:author: Soria, Teresa Lola Pena
Dinkhuysen, Jarbas J
Spina Neto, Domingos
Zarate, Jose Viera
Nogueira, Andrea de Souza
metadata.dc:description: This is the case of a patient with coronary aneurysms, who underwent CABG for surgical exclusion of these aneurysms, followed by implant of the bypass grafts to the arteries affected, with satisfactory short-term and long-term results.
metadata.dc:title: Coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) in the presence of coronary aneurysms.
